name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Integration Engineer with over 10 years of extensive experience in delivering high-performance solutions across healthcare and finance sectors. Expert in **Kubernetes**, **OpenShift**, **OpenStack**, and proficient with **TCP/IP**, **http2**, **TLS**, **IPSEC**, **DNS**, and **DIAMETER**. Skilled in troubleshooting and debugging with tools like **Wireshark**, **iPerf**, **putty**, **FileZilla**, and **MobaXterm**. Proven ability to develop and integrate complex applications, utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and demonstrating proficiency in frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Experienced in implementing cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, with a strong background in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation. Adept at ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, brings practical experience in MLOps—from developing ML pipelines and deploying models to managing workflows. Passionate about creating systems that are secure, maintainable, and drive impactful results.
